Verses: 1 aabakook Ennum Theerkkadharisi Dharisanamaaik Kanda Baaram.
2 karththaave, Naan Edhuvaraikkum Ummai Nokkik Kooppiduven. Neer Kelaamalirukkireere! Kodumaiyinimiththam Naan Edhuvaraikkum Ummai Nokkik Kooppiduven, Neer Ratchiyaamalirukkireere!
3 neer Enakku Akkiramaththaik Kaanbiththu, Ennaith Theevinaiyaip Paarkkappannugiradhenna? Kollaiyum Kodumaiyum Enakku Edhire Nirkiradhu; Vazhakkaiyum Vaadhaiyum Ezhuppugiravargal Undu.
4 aagaiyaal Nyaayappramaanam Belanatradhaagi, Nyaayam Orupodhum Sellaamarpogiradhu; Dhunmaarkkan Needhimaanai Valaindhukolgiraan; Aadhalaal Nyaayam Purattappadugiradhu.
5 neengal Purajaadhigalai Nokkip Paarththu, Aachchariyappattu Bramiyungal; Vivarikkappattaalum Neengal Visuvaasiyaadha Oru Kiriyaiyai Ungal Naatkalil Nadappippen.
6 idho, Naan Kaldheyarennum Kodidhum Vegamumaana Jaadhiyaarai Ezhuppuven; Avargal Thangaludaiyadhallaadha Vaasasthalangalaik Kattikkolla Dhesaththin Visaalangalil Nadandhuvaruvaargal.
7 avargal Kediyum Bayangaramumaanavargal; Avargaludaiya Nyaayamum Avargaludaiya Menmaiyum Avargalaaleye Undaagum.

8 avargaludaiya Kudhiraigal Sivingigalilum(siruththaigalaivida) Vegamum, Saayankaalaththil Thirigira Onaaigalilum Theeviramumaayirukkum; Avargaludaiya Kudhiraiveerar Paravuvaargal; Avargaludaiya Kudhiraiveerar Dhooraththilirundhu Varuvaargal; Iraikkuth Theevirikkira Kazhugugalaippol Parandhuvaruvaargal.
9 avargalellaarum Kodumai Seyyavaruvaargal; Avargaludaiya Mugangal Suvara Seyyum Keezhkkaatraippolirukkum; Avargal Manalaththanai Janangalai Siraipidiththu Serppaargal.
10 avargal Raajaakkalai Aagadiyampannuvaargal; Adhipadhigal Avargalukkup Pariyaasamaayiruppaargal; Avargal Arangalaiyellaam Paarththu Nagaiththu, Manmedugalaik Kuviththu Avaigalaip Pidippaargal.
11 appozhudhu Avanudaiya Manammaara, Avan Than Belan Than Dhevanaale Undaanadhendru Solli Minjippoik Kutravaaliyaavaan.

12 karththaave, Neer Poorvakaalamudhal En Dhevanum En Parisuththarumaanavar Allavaa? Naangal Saavadhillai, Karththaave, Nyaayaththeerppu Seyya Avanai Vaiththeer; Kanmalaiye, Thandanai Seyya Avanai Niyamiththeer.

13 theemaiyaip Paarkkamaattaadha Suththakkannane, Aniyaayaththai Nokkikkondirukkamaatteere; Pinnai Dhrogigalai Neer Nokkikkondirukkiradhenna? Dhunmaarkkan Thannaip Paarkkilum Needhimaanai Vizhungumpodhu Neer Mownamaayirukkiradhenna?
14 manusharai Samuththiraththu Machchangalukkum, Adhigaariyillaadha Oorvanavatrirkum Samaanamaakkugiradhenna?
15 avargalellaaraiyum Thoondilinaal Izhuththukkollugiraan; Avargalaith Than Valaiyinaal Pidiththu, Thanpariyile Serththukkollugiraan; Adhinaal Sandhoshappattuk Kalikoorugiraan.
16 aagaiyaal Avaigalinaal Thanpangu Kozhuppulladhum, Than Pojanam Rusigaramulladhumaayitru Endru Solli Avan Than Valaikkup Paliyittuth Than Parikkuth Thoobankaattugiraan.
17 idharkaaga Avan Than Valaiyai Izhuththu Adhilullavaigalaik Kottikkondirundhu, Irakkamillaamal Jaadhigalai Eppodhum Kondrupodavendumo?
